title: Mitsubishi Electric follows digital-first strategy for advanced air mobility
description:
Mitsubishi Electric United States is focused on helping companies with digital-first initiatives such as AnyMile for drone cargo management.

The post Mitsubishi Electric follows digital-first strategy for advanced air mobility appeared first on The Robot Report.
